text:
Message 1914 of 4024
I am happy to pay to ask questions, but I don't think we will like the answers. This is not about you and me trying to figure out anything that we need
to be more constructive and peaceful. This is about reunification. So, I assume Max and I, only now you and I can never talk or be in the same space
again, which may be fine, too. So, no basketball, robotics, Kerri Betts, SAAS emails or conference calls, no anything - period. Everything has to end,
full stop.
"Dr. Benjamin’s job is to help you improve communication between your child and you."
"If an e-mail is sent to the CoParent Psychotherapist and copied to the other parent, do not answer it before the CoParent Psychotherapist is able to
respond, first."
"Once, the treatment phase begins, for each email reviewed, you will be charged $5. Any email requiring a response from Dr. Benjamin will be charge
at $20 per response.
Based on what is stipulated, NO email can be answered w/o him responding. That's $25 a pop.
Your RO is pointless. This whole time I have been working to at least have some modicum of communication so we could do the things like we did
with Dr Brown, Kerri Betts, Basketball and Robotics, and most importantly getting Adrian into SAAS. That all goes away. We do nothing now.
We went from plans of nesting and the Alyssa model to this. Do you really believe this was all my fault? It all rests on me. Even as you said, you are in
total control, doing what you think is best. I tried so hard to extend an olive branch, and you are never ready. You won't make any effort whatsoever,
so now we have to be treated like toddlers and charged $25 an email.
You promised to consider my proposal to just stop and find something neutral to do to build something back. Today you said you would not
consider that any longer. You said today you would make time to discuss before the end of the week. It will be the last time we talk and I have no
reason to believe you will make good on that promise either.
• Yes, it is all your way. It is what you think is best?
• This is really how you wanted this to go for us?
• This is what you think the kids want to see from us?
We will hate each other's fucking guts till the wet sod is laid over our cold dead bodies. Such a waste of 3 decades and 3 kids. I ask you every few days
since you say it is your way or the highway... How is your way going? Still feeling pretty good about your master plan?
Sent:03/06/2024 at 11:58 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/07/2024 at 05:39 AM)
Subject:Re: Andy
Message 1915 of 4024
Funny huh? I congratulated you on "Teamwork" We just came off a string of impressive accomplishments as teammates working together for a
common goal ... ALL THIS WEEK
• Dr Brown Parenting Plan
• Getting Adrain into SAAS
• Kicking off Kerri Betts
Sent:03/07/2024 at 12:02 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/07/2024 at 05:39 AM)
Subject:Re: We Did It
